name: Surviving Mars - Season Pass
description:
PLEASE NOTE: the Season Pass is already included in the Surviving Mars - First Colony Edition. The base-game, Surviving Mars, is required to play all content included in the Season Pass.

Save money on content for this game by purchasing the Season Pass. Content can be downloaded from GOG.com when available.

Surviving Mars is a sci-fi city builder all about colonizing Mars and surviving the process. Choose a space agency for resources and financial support before determining a location for your colony. Build domes and infrastructure, research new possibilities and utilize drones to unlock more elaborate ways to shape and expand your settlement. Cultivate your own food, mine minerals or just relax by the bar after a hard day’s work. Most important of all, though, is keeping your colonists alive. Not an easy task on a strange new planet.

The Season Pass will add two full expansions and two content packs to Surviving Mars in the months following launch.

Save with the Season Pass and never miss a single addition -- each one is yours to download as soon as it arrives.
